rukus.text: fi adna l-ardi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibuna
fi bid'ʿi sinina lillahi l-amru min qablu wamin baʿdu wayawma-idhin yafrahu l-mu'minuna
binasri l-lahi yansuru man yashau wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-rahimu
waʿda l-lahi la yukh'lifu l-lahu waʿdahu walakinna akthara l-nasi la yaʿlamuna
yaʿlamuna zahiran mina l-hayati l-dun'ya wahum ʿani l-akhirati hum ghafiluna
awalam yatafakkaru fi anfusihim ma khalaqa l-lahu l-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma illa bil-haqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-inna kathiran mina l-nasi biliqai rabbihim lakafiruna

awalam yasiru fi l-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana ʿaqibatu alladhina min qablihim kanu ashadda min'hum quwwatan wa-atharu l-arda waʿamaruha akthara mimma ʿamaruha wajaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati fama kana l-lahu liyazlimahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
thumma kana ʿaqibata alladhina asau l-sua an kadhabu biayati l-lahi wakanu biha yastahziuna
